message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be of great value to you.  I'm asking for $11,500 for it.  What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Would you be willing to consider that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I see you recognize the value in this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price, Alice. Would you be willing to go down to $10,750?
